name: Piercing
description:
When this unit initiates combat, after the resolution of that combat, deal nonlethal damage equal to 50% of the damage dealt to target foe that combat to the nearest enemy in a three space perpendicular (3x1 line) behind target foe. For 4 TP, this effect may occur after a combat on enemy phase.

Disabled on weapons that are not Lances, Guile, Faith or Bows.

modifiers.tpcost: fill affirm([Pierce on Enemy Phase?], label [After Combat] {4}, 0)

comment: Items in modifers should be integers
